column6:
"EXIT STRATEGY" PART 1 (OF 1) FINAL ISSUE! ,2001,11
All your questions are answered! Will Captain Marvel regain his sanity? Will Rick stay bonded to Marv forever? Will he ever get it on with his super-hot wife, Marlo, again? More importantly, will we get to watch? Is Moondragon dead or alive? And of course, what do we do with little Phyla? She's so cute.
column8: | penciller (cover):Chriscross | writer:Peter David | penciller:Keith Giffen | inker:Al Gordon | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
